channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Digital car keys are getting more sophisticated
item.description: Last month, over a dozen automobile and smartphone manufacturers gathered in Palo Alto, California, for the 16th annual "Plugfest," hosted by the Car Connectivity Consortium (CCC) to test out the latest in digital key technology. Digital keys, which allow vehicle owners to lock, unlock, and start their cars using smartphones or other digital devices, are […]...

item.title: Darty propose ce robot aspirateur-laveur Ecovacs équipé de deux serpillères et d’une puissance d’aspiration de 25 000 Pa pour 250 euros de moins
item.description: L'Ecovacs Deebot T30C est un robot aspirateur-laveur qui peut passer sur toutes les surfaces, même les tapis. Il peut aussi nettoyer vos sols grâce à ses deux serpillières. Ce robot multifonctions perd 250 euros de son prix et tombe à 349,99 euros chez Darty.

item.title: What’s the Difference Between SpaceX’s Starlink, Amazon Leo, and Blue Origin’s TeraWave?
item.description: These constellations are all key players within a new generation of space-based internet providers, but differ wildly in terms of scale, deployment, purpose, and target market.

item.title: The Shoes and Brooms Transforming Curling at the 2026 Winter Olympics
item.description: Halfway between chess and bocce, curling is experiencing an evolution thanks to technology. From brooms to stones to footwear, here’s everything you need to know about the game’s gadgets.

item.title: 4 Best AI Notetakers (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: A growing collection of pocket-sized gadgets lets you record your meetings and extract value from them. Here are our favorites.

item.title: How to watch Puppy Bowl 2026 online and stream from anywhere — date, TV channels, Super Bowl for dogs
item.description: Adorable pups face off as Team Ruff battles Team Fluff. Here's how to watch Puppy Bowl 2026 online from anywhere.

item.title: How to watch Super Bowl 2026 in Canada — Free streaming available
item.description: How to watch Super Bowl LX in Canada, as the Seattle Seahawks take on the New England Patriots in the NFL championship game.

item.title: "The height of nonsense": Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison’s 1987 argument that not everything should be AI makes perfect sense in 2026
item.description: Decades before the current AI boom, Oracle's Larry Ellison argued that applying AI to every problem was "the height of nonsense."

item.title: I Have Fallen in Love With Open Earbuds (and You Should Too)
item.description: From jogging and cycling to multi-tasking or puttering around the house, open earbuds are an excellent way to jam out in the real world.

item.title: Best Vacuum Cleaner (2026): Cordless Vacuums, Robot Vacuums, Dysons
item.description: Looking for all our top recommended vacuums? Here are our favorites in every style we’ve tested, from stick vacs to robot vacuums.

item.title: Ubisoft qui coupe ses serveurs, l’avenir de Visa en Europe, l’iPhone Fold et la panne Free TV – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Quelles ont été les infos les plus marquantes de la semaine dans le monde de la tech ? Entre coupures de serveurs et innovations en matière de paiements. Voici le récapitulatif complet des actualités les plus lues sur Frandroid ces derniers jours.
